testcase.name: To check flow of Adactin hotel booking room functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User in adcatin login page............................................passed When User enter valid username and valid password...........................passed And User click login button and user should navigate to search hotel page...passed And User select all require field...........................................passed And User click search button and should navigate to select hotel page.......passed And User select hotel in list and click continue and user should be navigate to book hotel page.passed And user enter details "uvaish","Mohamed","GreenTech, perumbakkam ,Chennai.","9874561233216549","VISA","2", "2022","895".passed And User click Booknow button and navigate to booking confirmation page.....passed And User click my itinerary button then user get order id of booking details.passed And User click search hotel button moved to home page of search hotel page..passed Then User should be succesflly navigate to search hotel main page...........passed
